block.p: GRECO--Sal. The Officers, Governors, and Members of The Friars Club deeply mourn the loss of their beloved honorary officer, Salvatore F. Greco, who was a member for over four decades. We are honored and proud to have been touched by our Patriarch whose generosity and support has helped us to maintain our status as one of the best clubs in New York City. Services will be held at Shrine of Old St. Joseph, 321 Willings Alley, ''Society Hill'', Philadephia, PA, on June 11 at 10 am. Jerry Lewis, Abbot Freddie Roman, Dean JeanPierre Trebot, Exec. Dir.

GRECO--Sal. The Officers, Governors, and Members of The Friars Club deeply mourn the loss of their beloved honorary officer, Salvatore F. Greco, who was a member for over four decades. We are honored and proud to have been touched by our Patriarch whose generosity and support has helped us to maintain our status as one of the best clubs in New York City. Services will be held at Shrine of Old St. Joseph, 321 Willings Alley, ''Society Hill'', Philadephia, PA, on June 11 at 10 am. Jerry Lewis, Abbot Freddie Roman, Dean JeanPierre Trebot, Exec. Dir.
